::Zardus::

Zardus' wrist comp beeps, reporting a bot at the entrance of the Alliance 
base. He frowns, standing up and walking out of the room. He'd activate the 
femm when he got back.

Zardus walks out of the Alliance base, looking at the new bot.

"I am Zardus," he says, "Commander of the Alliance. You said you want to 
join?"
